title: Betty Boop in Color | Fleischer Short Films | 31 Cartoon Episodes | Animation Marathon

sources.title: Betty Boop in Color | Fleischer Short Films | 31 Cartoon Episodes | Animation Marathon
sources.description:
Boop-oop-a-doop your way into her world, and you'll never look back! 
31 animated short cartoons. 

Betty Boop: The iconic animated bombshell with a heart of gold.  Known for her sassy charm, flirtatious personality, and signature voice that'll make your head spin. Created by Max Fleischer in the 1930s, this sassy flapper, became a symbol of the Jazz Age,  has been winking her way into our hearts ever since.

Betty Boop is a pop culture phenomenon and a timeless influential figure in the world of animation.
